title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: LOT 1: 1HoDLCLUB BTCitcoin and Litecoin Casino Membership cardsBitcoin card #BC-B46 // Litecoin card #LC-B27Original sales thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5358763STARTING BID: 0.0100BTCLOT 2: Ballet Pure Bitcoin 4x card lot:1x graded 9.5 100,000 Sats Pure card2x 100,000 Sats Pure cards1x 10,000 Sats Pure cardAll cards are new and unusedSTARTING BID: 0.0010BTCLOT 3: Moon Money NFC note sets1x BTC / 1x ETH / 1x Doge NFC notesComes with 2x bonus One Doge Moon Money stickersOfficial link: https://www.cryptochips.io/products/moon-money2 LOTS AVAILABLESTARTING BID PER LOT: 0.0015BTC LOT 4: Offline.Cash note setsThe envelopes are sealed, so here is a link to pictures of the notes from user xSlyy https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5406538.msg61161891#msg61161891Official website: https://offline.cash/4 LOTS AVAILABLESTARTING BID: 0.0020BTC**LOT 3 and LOT 4 will work on a LIFO system as seen in previous multi-lot multi-item auctions**Winners of LOT 4 will chose set number based on win order**Bonus: 2019 10,000 Bitcoins Pizza note made by Vizique**All winners will be entered into a free raffle at the end of the auction to win this note! LOT 1LOT 2LOT 3LOT 4BONUS NOTESTARTING BID PER LOT: SEE ABOVEMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT PER ITEM: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: FEBRUARY 6th, 2023, 13:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference
